special_abilities.name: Call for Backup
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action during the first round of combat, if the captain is in his own territory, he can call for backup. When a captain calls for backup, 1d4 soldiers appear at the end of his turn.

special_abilities.name: Rally (3/day)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the captain can rally its allies within 30ft of itself to give them +2 to attack and damage rolls for the next round.

actions.name: Disruptor Rifle
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, one target. Hit 9 (1d8 + 4) radiant damage. DC 14 Con save or stunned 1 round.

actions.name: Dual Blaster Pistols
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, one target. Hit 7 (1d4 + 4) radiant damage.
